game is as amazing as i remember but lotus are just way too powerful even with full handicap and on easy mode  it never crashes for me even at 4k res  although theres a minor glitch where theres an fps drop for a couple seconds when you enter and close the menu during battle but it doesnt affect gameplay really wish there was a japanese dub but for such an old game i dont expect that will happen

i wish the admins should improve the network connections for better gameplay
brought back my nostalgic childhood game thank you

played the game since it released in 2001  game is fun if you play with friends but the devs need to nerf the lotus clan its ridiculous how overtuned it is it used to be back in 2001 too but now that they balanced a few units etc they had the chance to fix that they didnt considering that one out of four clansraces dominates this much i do not recommend the game in the current state  maybe if they balance the game better its worth a buy currently its not would refund if i could
good i wait for lotus story

played this in my youth and i thought it was one of the greatest rts games there was the peasantricewater mechanics i found unique the characters memorable and the 45 multiplayer matches i have ever done back when you had to have gamespy arcade i will never forget even with how cringe i was for a lack of a better word  i love this game everything about it as well as all the memories attached to it
good game decejt strategy games used to loved the bug its a great solo game also

game plays as good as i remember it from when i was a kid i had trouble getting it to run on linux with wayland but switching to an x11 session fixed the issues i was having finished the campaign with no issues

i really love all the changes made in the zen edition the graphics are just the same which actually a good thing because i can run it even with my old low spec laptop even with the old graphics the game is still immersive i love the mechanics of the game which made it unique to most of the rts games ai is a lot better too so be careful of your army from the dragon nukes

i love everthing about the game i want more story mode while keeping kenji

i recently bought this game expecting a great experience since i used to enjoy it a lot when i was younger the multiplayer mode is enjoyable especially because i can play with my siblings but the game is filled with bugs the queue times often last longer than the actual gameplay and occasionally one of us gets disconnected midgame even with a strong internet connection the lag is also a big issue its really frustrating to feel like i wasted my money on this game
i really love this game but the update sucks
